docs.snippet: Damian Lillard scored 40 points as Portland routed Golden State, which was again playing without Stephen Curry, who was still nursing a sprained right knee....
docs.lead_paragraph: Damian Lillard scored 40 points as Portland routed Golden State, which was again playing without Stephen Curry, who was still nursing a sprained right knee.
docs.abstract: Portland Trail Blazers beat Golden State Warriors, 120-108, in Game 3 of Western Conference semifinals.

headline.main: With Stephen Curry Absent, Warriors Take a Beating

docs.snippet: The women on the City Council were attacked in sexist emails and social media posts after they rejected a land-use deal that would have paved the way for a sports arena....
docs.lead_paragraph: The women on the City Council were attacked in sexist emails and social media posts after they rejected a land-use deal that would have paved the way for a sports arena.
docs.abstract: Seattle City Council's five-woman majority provokes sexist backlash on social media after voting against deal aimed at building new sports arena; male officials' effort to defend council members itself draws fire; issue pits city's liberal ethos against its ardor for sports.

headline.main: Majority-Female Council in Seattle Faces Backlash After Sports Arena Vote
headline.print_headline: Majority-Female Council in Seattle Faces Backlash for Rejecting Arena Deal

docs.snippet: The problem isn’t willpower. It’s neuroscience. You can’t — and shouldn’t — fight back....
docs.lead_paragraph: The problem isn’t willpower. It’s neuroscience. You can’t — and shouldn’t — fight back.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Sandra Aamodt highlights fact that growing body of research shows dieting is rarely effective form of weight loss and can do more harm to person than good; points out brain's weight-regulation system is responsible for failure of diets and suggests better alternative to dieting is combination of mindful eating and exercise.

headline.main: Why You Can’t Lose Weight on a Diet
